title: Ping Issue
body: Ever since yesterday 9/5 ive had constant ping from 200-700+ . My first game yesterday i had 500-550 ping from start to finish. My internet is fine and other games have good ping so im guessing its something to do with my ISP and Riot server??

replies.body: My Internet is good but i'm getting lag. Around 160-250.

You're probably right with that guess. Sometimes your own internet can be spot on, but for whatever reason it has a really hard time connecting to our servers specifically. Let's take a quick look at how your connection looks after leaving your network by having our [**log reader**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743) scan some of your recent network logs. Paste a screenshot of what it shows here so I can go over it with you!
Open a network log and screenshot it or just screenshot the network logs without opening it?
